Question for PS2 players out there...
 
Because this game is for Japanese release, will it still play on PS2's sold in the US?  I've wondered about that.
 
phil

LMTame@... wrote:
If I remember correctly, Watsuki-san did the character designs for this
game, so I guess I'm not overly surprised that Saitou's sword is on the
correct side.  :-D  

I so can not wait to get my hands on this game . . . my three favorite
things: swords, samurai, and the Shinsengumi . .. drool . . .
